Um, Shomin, the Alliance base has shields, defences, and all the other 
things. Plus there are bots inside and out. Getting past the shields and into 
the Alliance base in one post, not to mention getting through the base and 
into the conference room (hence past the internal defences as well), is 
moding. Please rewrite that post.
